img.alt: Memory Project 1
img.title: Fostering Worldwide Connections Through Art
img.p: Fostering Worldwide Connections Through Art modal link

div.p: East Meadow High School students in grades 10-12 made connections with children across the globe by drawing their portraits as part of the Memory Project. The Memory Project is a youth arts organization that asks high school art students throughout... < Read More >

img.title: EMHS Seniors Named Presidential Scholar Semifinalists
img.p: EMHS Seniors Named Presidential Scholar Semifinalists modal link

h3.a: EMHS Seniors Named Presidential Scholar Semifinalists

div.p: Brendan Connor Wilkowski and Ikshu Pandey, two graduating seniors from East Meadow High School, have been named among the 621 semifinalists in the 2020 U.S. Presidential Scholars Program. The semifinalists were selected from nearly 5,600... < Read More >

img.title: Sending Thanks to Health Care Workers
img.p: Sending Thanks to Health Care Workers modal link

h3.a: Sending Thanks to Health Care Workers

div.p:
Art classes throughout the East Meadow School District created posters and signs to thank health care workers during the COVID-19 crisis. Students have been displaying their work on front doors, in windows and outside of their homes.
“We... < Read More >

img.alt: EM NAMM Recognition
img.title: East Meadow Receives National Recognition
img.p: East Meadow Receives National Recognition modal link

div.p:
The East Meadow School District has been honored with the Best Communities for Music Education designation, for the second year in a row, by the NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education.
For the past 21 years, the NAMM... < Read More >

img.title: East Meadow Shines at LISEF
img.p: East Meadow Shines at LISEF modal link

div.p:
Five students from the East Meadow School District were named winners in the Long Island Science and Engineering Fair.
W.T. Clarke High School senior Abishek Ravindran captured first place in the category of behavioral and social science, while... < Read More >
